question.en-US: Could you show me where the laptop is?
question.zh-CN: 你能告诉我笔记本电脑在哪里吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以話我筆記本電腦喺邊度啊？

question.en-US: Can you find the backpack in the scene?
question.zh-CN: 你能在场景中找到背包吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以喺場景中搵到背囊啊？

question.en-US: Could you point out the location of the dining table to me?
question.zh-CN: 你能给我指出餐桌的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以畀我指出餐桌嘅位置啊？

question.en-US: Which way should I look to find the book from here?
question.zh-CN: 我应该从这里往哪个方向寻找书？
question.zh-HK: 我應該從這裡往哪個方向尋找書？

question.en-US: Can you tell me the location of the closest chair to me?
question.zh-CN: 你能告诉我离我最近的椅子的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以話我离我最近嘅椅子嘅位置啊？

question.en-US: Where is the dining table in relation to my current position?
question.zh-CN: 相对于我当前位置，餐桌在哪里？
question.zh-HK: 相對于我當前位置，餐桌喺邊度？

question.en-US: Can you tell me the direction of the tv from my current location?
question.zh-CN: 你能告诉我电视相对于我当前位置的方向吗？
question.zh-HK: 你能告訴我電視相對于我當前位置的方向嗎？

question.en-US: Where is the nearest keyboard to me?
question.zh-CN: 离我最近的键盘在哪里？
question.zh-HK: 離我最近嘅鍵盤喺邊度？

question.en-US: Where is the chair that is closest to me?
question.zh-CN: 离我最近的椅子在哪里？
question.zh-HK: 離我最近嘅椅子喺邊度？

question.en-US: In which direction is the dining table from my current position?
question.zh-CN: 餐桌在我当前位置的什么方向?
question.zh-HK: 餐桌由我而家嘅位置喺邊個方向？

question.en-US: Where can I find the closest book to me?
question.zh-CN: 在哪里可以找到离我最近的书？
question.zh-HK: 喺邊度可以搵到離我最近嘅書？

question.en-US: Can you direct me to the location of the teddy bear?
question.zh-CN: 你能把我引向泰迪熊的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你能把我引向啤啤熊的位置嗎？

question.en-US: Could you point out the location of the dining table to me?
question.zh-CN: 你能给我指出餐桌的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以畀我指出餐桌嘅位置啊？

question.en-US: Where can I find the closest book to me?
question.zh-CN: 在哪里可以找到离我最近的书？
question.zh-HK: 喺邊度可以搵到離我最近嘅書？

question.en-US: What is the position of the nearest chair relative to me?
question.zh-CN: 离我最近的椅子的位置是什么？
question.zh-HK: 離我最近嘅椅子嘅位置係乜嘢？

question.en-US: Can you identify where the bottle is in the scene?
question.zh-CN: 你能确定瓶子在场景中的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你能肯定瓶子喺場景中嘅位置呀？

question.en-US: Can you direct me to the location of the teddy bear?
question.zh-CN: 你能把我引向泰迪熊的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你能把我引向啤啤熊的位置嗎？

question.en-US: Can you show me where the dining table is?
question.zh-CN: 你能告诉我餐桌在哪里吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以話我餐桌喺邊度啊？
